Posts.Content: Sep 17, 2013 11:02PM tessie51 wrote: thanks to all of you. My biopsy went fine yesterday-I actually didn't feel a thing. Now just waiting for results which they said wednesday or thursday-most likely thursday.  I'll let you know when I hear.
Posts.Title: Possible re-occurance tessie51 momof2doxies

Posts.Content: tessie51 wrote: Hi, I was diagnosed with stage 1 breast cancer-right breast- in Nov 2006, had a mastectomy dec and had chemo from jan 2007- june 2007-tried tamoxifen but had trouble with it. I have a weird shaped lump with pain and bruising in my left breast now that has been there for over a month so I went to my Oncologist for her to check it out. I have many cysts in my breast anyway so normally they'll feel around and say, "Feels like a cyst so nothing to worry about' so that is what I was hoping for this time. Instead she said I needed to get it tested right away. I have a mammo, US and biospy ( if needed) planned for Monday 09/09. Just wondering what's the chance of it being cancer again and would it be considered a reoccurance or a new cancer? what determines that? Thanks. It's good to have a site to come to to get your fears out in the open. Hope I can be of help sometimes. Tessie  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Possible re-occurance tessie51 momof2doxies

Posts.Content: Sep 17, 2013 11:04PM tessie51 wrote: Praying that you get good results. I know its hard but try not to worry.
Posts.Title: Possible re-occurance tessie51 momof2doxies

Posts.Content: Sep 16, 2013 12:07AM tessie51 wrote: Thanks all of you who have answered. I went for my mammo/US on 09/09 and I am due for a biopsy on 09/16. The reason I had to wait so long is because I am on a blood thinner because of having mechanical valve in my heart and I had to be off of it for 5 days. The radiologist said it looks suspicious but can't be sure until after biopsy-then, of course, 3-4 days after that. Oh well, at least I'll know by the end of the week. I will let ya'll know my results. Thanks
